info.name: EZTV: Fresh look for big screens and Smart TVs
info.description: A modern, fresh look for the TV surfer. If you're one of those browsing EZTV on your TV, then you're going to love this style! It includes bigger, more readable fonts, new icons, softer colors, alternating line colors, and big, beautiful images in pages like the Show List and the Show Details.
info.additionalInfo:
- Each section of the site was placed in its own regular expression statement, to make it easier to enable/disable the style on selected sections. (In future versions, I might implement this via Style Settings, but for now, this is the best you're going to get. Sorry.)
- Most of the effort went into the home page and the Show-related pages, which means other pages (such as the Calendar or Countdown) will not as good as the homepage, though they will still be fully functional (and STILL moderately better-looking than the default style.)
